alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 11:55AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wasatch and southwestern Summit Counties through 1230 PM MDT... At 1154 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Samak, or 13 miles east of Park City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kamas, Oakley, Francis, Samak, Peoa, Trial Lk, Marion and Woodland. This includes the following highways... Utah Route 35 between mile markers 0 and 4. Mirror Lake Highway between mile markers 0 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
